description.value:
You bring your booted foot down on the ground with enough force to rattle your foes. Each creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] must attempt a @Check[reflex|against:guardian|options:area-effect,damaging-effect,inflicts:off-guard,inflicts:prone] saving throw against your class DC.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the end of your turn.

Failure The creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Critical Failure The creature is knocked prone and takes @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage] damage from the fall.
